Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Kaadu diggah usun qambaalinnoonuy keenil bukku ittam fan keenih aysuk ten yallih garil, Yalli dambi cabti-li, xuwaw-li
Kee nummayse maraaw! Umeyni xaagu siinih baahek, kay xaagu ismita umaanek barih yan mara iggimat xagtaanamak, edde luk abteenimil nadaamita mara akkķkettoonuk

Kaadu diggah sin addal Yallih farmoyti yanim ixiga moominiiney, kaa essekexxa siinih meqem yaaxigehik, caagiidak maggoomuy isin faxxaanal sin oggolaamal gadan-gadditak tenen kaadu kinnih immay Yalli iimaan sin yikciniseeh sin sorkocô baxittet kaa bilqiseeh teemeneenih, kaadu koroosannuvy, Yallih taaqatih mawqaa kee dambit assaanam sin yinqibiseh, woo mari usun tirri iyyeeh cakki gita gexe mara
Tamah Yallak tan muxxoo kee maqaane usun geenim, Yalli ixxiga-li, naggaara

Kaadu moominiinik namma butta toome tet tekkekii, ken nammayih fan bicisa, kaadu ken naqmmayak tiyák teyna, akittot taturtekii, taturte tiyâ lih oomiya, Yallih amrih gacca ittam fanah. Kaadu is tuduure tet tekkekii, ken nammayih fan qadlil bicisa kaadu abinnaanih cokmi qadlil aba, diggah Yalli qadli-abá kicna
Cagalah moominiin toobokok, sin namma toobokoh fan bicisaay, Yallak meesita, Yalli siinih xuwaawankeeh

Kee nummayse maraaw! Labha labhal siinik anqase waytay, keenik tayse labhaay takkehik elle anqasan labha. Kaadu agabi agabul siinik anqasewaay keenik yayse agabuuy yakkeenihik elle anqasan agabi. Kaadu sitta maqaybisinaay, uma- bagullel (Sali-migaaqal) sittah maseecina, manxu uma migaaqaay moominti faasiktul (umeynal) muggaqsimam iimaanaak gamadal, kaadu amahak aduurewaah toobitewaa marii, too mari usun daalimiini
